name: Urdu Nastaleeq
description: This is style will render any pages with defined rtl using Nastaleeq fonts.
additional_info:
Credit goes to All who worked for creating HTML, CSS, Fonts (especially Nastaleeq Fonts). The fonts will be picked in the following order:
  • Alvi Nastaleeq
  • Jameel Noori Nastaleeq
  • Urdu Typesetting
  • Alvi Lahori Nastaleeq
    • Tahoma
